column1: #Text=GT : Now the journalists and the people in power , the government and financial world , they 're all of the same class , which is privileged class .
#Text=Journalists are people who are distant from those who are " The Deciders " , to use Bush 's phrase .

column1: #Text=I think there is an all-inclusiveness , and I think the Washington Press Corp is representative of what I am saying .
#Text=They co-mingle ; they live in the same neighborhoods and they go to the same places .
#Text=The Washington Press Corp. is the worst .
#Text=DS : Did you see Stephen Colbert roast the Washington Press Corp and Bush at the White House Press Correspondence dinner ?
#Text=Nobody laughed , because they were all coming from the same place .
#Text=GT : And it got a bad review , and then a revised review !
#Text=The first account I read -- I did n't see it or watch it -- was that it was boring .
#Text=Then it took on a life of its own !
#Text=DS : Because nobody reported about it , or they just said he bombed .
#Text=Then it went out on the internet and took on a life of its own and people said , "
